entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bridgetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 12:42 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle and Fog
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
